outputs.output_descr: The project is envisaged to contribute to efforts on enhancing South Africa's regional and global role in peace, security and development through the promotion of development exchanges between UNDP Country Offices, collaboration between think-tanks and academic institutions with policy makers. Provision of neutral forum for debate and exchange of information and publication of knowledge products.(reports, policy briefs and training )

project_title: Support to South Africa's Regional and Global Engagement
